kalekin aayeth blog ekata liyanna enna une.pahugiya kalema wibhaga katayuthu nisa ee wade maga aruna.kohomahari giyaka sulamula kiyala pahugiya kale liyapu lipi tikata honda prathichara thibunu nisa hithuna thawath me wage sinduwak hadenna pasubim unu siduwimak gana liyanna.ada mama thoragaththu githaya thamayi karunarathna diwulgane gayakaya gayana karana uthurin ena dumriyadewi kiyana githaya.githaye padamalawa prawina githa rachaka mahinda chandrasekara.methuma pahugiya dawasaka ape sarasawiyata aawa gi rasa windana wadasatahanakata.ithin mama me sinduwe sulamula hoyagaththe oya wadasatahanen thamayi.ethuma me giyata hethu sadaka wechcha siduwima lassanata wisthara kala.

dushana mardana lekam karyalaye nirmathru wanne agamathi wikramasinhaya.2015 juli masa 2 dathamin yuthu kabinat pathrikawen mema karyalaya hadunwadun ohu, barapathala wancha, mulya aparadha saha dushana sambandhayen wana wimarshana katayuthu sambandhikaranaya kirima ehi pradhana karyabharaya lesa hadunwadunne ya.eya kriyathmaka wuye janapathiwaraya sabhapathithwaya darana jathika widhayaka kawunsilaya yatathe wu, agamathi wikramasinhage pradhanithwayen kriyathmaka wana kabinat upakamituwak yatatheya.mema kamituwa pragathi samalochana kamituwak lesa da kriyathmaka wiya.janatha wimukthi peramunu nayaka anura kumara disanayaka mahatha mehi samajikayaku wu athara ohu pasuwa illa aswiya.anathuruwa gewunu masa kihipaye di mema kamituwe kriyakarithwaya kramayen pahala basseya.

nirosha perera katha nayikawa wana mehi sanath gunathilaka, chandani senewirathna, damitha aberathna, himali sayurangi, semini iddamalgoda, nilmini buwaneka, liyoni kothalawala, kumara thirimadura, roshan rawindra wani athi daksha rangana shilpin saha shilpiniyan rasakagema rangum athulathya.

prabala kasakasthanayata erehiwa lakunu 49-18ka wishishta jayak athkara gath nawika luthinan yoshitha rajapakshage nayakathwayen yuth shri lanka ragar kandayama aasiyanu ‘fayiw neshans‘ palamu kotase ragar tharagawaliye shurathawa athkara ganimata samathwiya.ee samangama labana wasare pawathwena aasiyanu supiri ratawal pahe tharagawaliyata usaswimak laba ganimata da shri lankawata hakiwiya.mewara ema tharagawaliya 2015 loka kusalana ragar tharagamalawata aasiyawen sudussan thorana tharagawaliya lesa da salake.

me nisa aaloka pujawe aalokayath samangama, 1965 di eli dakina lada ‘budusarana’ sadaham puwathpathehi prathama pitapatha mihinthala raja maha wiharadhipathi walawahangunu wawe rathanapala rathanajothi na himiyanta piliganwima da sadanusmaraniya siduwimaki.paththara mahagedarin arambau aaloka pujawata samagamiwa 1978 wasaredi widulibala mandalaye sahayada pasukalinawa ek wiya.me nisa dinen dinama bahula wu wandanakaruwange pahasuwa udesa ‘ mihinthala aaloka bharaya’ bihi wuye da wiharadhipathi na himiyange nomanda wiryaye prathipalayak nisaya.aaloka pujawata pamanak sima nowu paththara maha gedara pinbara karthawya thawath pulul wemin adhyapanika ha samajika washayen da pradeshawasinta salasu sethada agayiya yuthu weyi.1989 di pradeshaye daham pasal ha pasal daru dariyan 125 denekuge sahabhagithwayen mihinthala puda bime di sila samadana wadasatahanak arambaini.
uu ara ganu lamayingen step ekak igena ganna eyalage kakul diha bala gena indala ala karagani kiyala mata nam muladima hithuna . . .

wyapthi_ shrawya drushya igenum aadharaka saha idiripath kirime thakshanaya pilibanda puhunu pawathwimawyapthi_ madhya ha maha parimana mattame gowipala pihituwima/ upades sewawabija sahathika kirima_ palathuru boga thawan liyapadinchi kirima ha palathuru pala sahathika kirimabija sahathika kirima_ gunathmaka bija ha pala nishpadanaya pilibanda puhunu ha danuwath kirime wadasatahanawi_ nawa abhijanana wi prabhedayanhi biththara wi wyaptha kirima mahawali nishpadanasanrakshana_ salwiniya saha japanjabara palanaya sandaha jaiwa widyathmaka palanaya yodaganimapalibodhanashaka_ palibodhanashaka wishleshanaya jana sampath_ paramparika boga prabhedawala bija niyadi sapayimabija sahathika kirima_ deshiya menma aanayanaya karana lada bija sandaha bija pariksha sidukirimakompost pohora ha pala warga laba ganima.jana sampath_ palruti jana sampath sambandhayen mahajanathawa danuwath kirime wadasatahanawyawasayakayin sadaha awashya mahawali puhunu shramayawi_ panshu pariksha sidukirimabija sahathika kirima_ gunanaya kirima sandaha palathuru mawushaka therimawi_ wadi aswanu wibhawayak prathirodhi nawa wi prabheda niyadi labadimahonda aare abhijanana sathun laba ganimawi_ usas gunathmayen yuthu prathirodhi nawa wi prabheda niyadi labadima.wyapthi_ krushikarma pradarshana pawathwima kiri ha saththwa nishpadana miladi ganima.nishpadana miladi ganimata pera giwisum sadaha elambaenne keseda?15.
